title: Stormwater discharge permits (NPDES)
dataVerified: Permit holder, facility, discharge points, monitoring requirements, EPA/state
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Permit status (active/expired/revoked). Link to EPA/state water quality agency system (enforcement and public, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake discharge permits. Domain binding verifies EPA/state water quality agency. Clean Water Act compliance. Prevents water pollution violations. High fines ($25K-$50K per day violations).
